results.summary: The price for CC.D.C.USS.IP has opened at 397 and closed at 398.8 since the 31st of July 2024. The highest price was 400.3, on the 5th of August, and the lowest 390, on the same day. The Bollinger Bands are indicating a neutral signal with the Bollinger Bands being relatively wide and the stock price being close to the upper Bollinger Band. The overall risk level is medium with a value of 3 out of 5. The overall risk is medium with a value of 3 out of 5. The overall trend is upward.
